title: How to Easily Draw a Dolphin

steps.title: Start with drawing an aerofoil shape, resembling the part found in airplanes.
steps.content: Start with drawing an aerofoil shape, resembling the part found in airplanes.

steps.title: Draw an oblong tilted upper right at the top part of the aerofoil.
steps.content: Draw an oblong tilted upper right at the top part of the aerofoil.

steps.title: Add the snout of the dolphin or its mouth from crate.
steps.content: Add the snout of the dolphin or its mouth from crate.

steps.title: Draw the tail using a triangle as a framework at the bottom of the aerofoil.
steps.content: Draw the tail using a triangle as a framework at the bottom of the aerofoil.

steps.title: Refine the tail by using curves and draw the dolphin’s eyes.
steps.content: Refine the tail by using curves and draw the dolphin’s eyes.

steps.title: Trace with a pen.
steps.content: Trace with a pen. Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Draw a curve that looks a bit like a cursive lowercase letter “r”.
steps.content: Draw a curve that looks a bit like a cursive lowercase letter “r”.

steps.title: Draw a U shape where the top right joins the previous line.
steps.content: Draw a U shape where the top right joins the previous line.

steps.title: Join the top right of the U to the bottom of the first line you just drew.
steps.content: Join the top right of the U to the bottom of the first line you just drew. Then mimic the shape just below to create the stomach of the dolphin.

steps.title: Add a dorsal fin on the back of the dolphin that looks line a slanted lowercase “n”.
steps.content: Add a dorsal fin on the back of the dolphin that looks line a slanted lowercase “n”.

steps.title: Draw the tail, which is like a cross between a boomerang and an upside-down heart.
steps.content: Draw the tail, which is like a cross between a boomerang and an upside-down heart.

steps.title: Add a U shape inside the dolphin for a flipper.
steps.content: Add a U shape inside the dolphin for a flipper.

steps.title: Draw a mouth and eye to complete your dolphin.
steps.content: Draw a mouth and eye to complete your dolphin.
